sourcing.instructions: - Er2O3: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in rare earth elements.

steps: 1. After reaching 800 째C, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Once the material is at room temperature, remove it from the mold carefully.
